job_tasks.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to improving an AI system by applying human expertise to its deficiencies, which is a core aspect of model improvement and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions participating in 'AI model fine-tuning sessions', a key activity within the Modeling task category.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies falls under the development and integration of AI into systems, which aligns with Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of human expertise with AI to enhance its capabilities and resolve complex issues, which is directly related to improving AI models.

soft_skills.phrase: take two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on using and improving existing AI systems, particularly through feedback and fine-tuning. However, it lacks specific details about building AI models from scratch or advanced development of generative AI applications. The emphasis is more on AI-assisted problem-solving and iterative improvement rather than core AI engineering.
